nodes.text: The elder gods were divine entities Queen Zalem of the Nightsisters believed held the power of the Infinity Gates of Dathomir. Zalem claimed that the elder gods held power beyond measure, power that the Sisters could harness by opening the Infinity Gates.

The elder gods were mentioned in passing in the Infinity's End story arc of the Republic comic series. Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side established that Nightsister religion under Mother Talzin was centered around the Spirits, primarily the Twin Deities—the Fanged God and the Winged Goddess.
